statements: UPDATE production_line_data SET machine_output = 1500.25, defect_rate = 0.03 WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE production_line_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-15T08:30:00Z', machine_output = 1200.75 WHERE machine_id = 5;
UPDATE production_line_data SET defect_rate = 0.02 WHERE machine_id = 101;
UPDATE production_line_data SET machine_output = 2500.50, timestamp = '2022-06-15T10:30:00Z' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 10.5, timestamp = '2022-08-15 09:30:00' WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_count = 5, defect_type = 'malfunction', timestamp = '2022-08-15 09:45:00' WHERE defect_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 10.5, timestamp = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_count = defect_count + 1, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, defect_type = 'Crack' WHERE defect_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 100 WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_type = 'Error' WHERE defect_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 100, timestamp = '2022-08-15 08:30:00' WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_type = 'mechanical', timestamp = '2022-08-20 10:45:00' WHERE defect_id = 5;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 1000, timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE production_data SET defect_id = 2, output_value = 800, timestamp = '2022-01-16 09:45:00' WHERE production_id = 3;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_value = 1000, timestamp = '2022-10-01 08:00:00' WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE production_data SET output_value = 500, timestamp = '2022-09-15 14:30:00', defect_id = 2 WHERE machine_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_quantity = 100 WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_rate = 0.05 WHERE defect_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_outputs SET output_quantity = output_quantity + 10, timestamp = NOW() WHERE machine_id = 1;
UPDATE defect_rates SET defect_rate = 0.05 WHERE machine_id = 2;
